Have you ever typed `Amazon` into the Google Chrome address bar and seen the address bar indicate that it's now searching the Amazon site? It turns out this is because Google Chrome has a feature called site search shortcuts.

We can see what these shortcouts are by going to <chrome://settings/searchEngines>.

From here we can see that we can define our own shortcuts, so let's define some helpful ones related to R.
